Introducing Dot Flow A smooth animated loading component that adds life to your interface

Huge thanks to
- @shadcn for the cli
- @greensock for the animation library
- @Griveau for the component inspiration https://t.co/ZWkBkuo1ct https://t.co/rLl2RgpfPM
